Twitter users wrapper¶

class twitterfeatures.twitterusers.TwitterUsers(token, token_secret, consumer_key, consumer_secret)¶

Twitter users (human and bot) manager class

add_user(userid, usertype='human')¶

Add one user to the Twitter user list

append_user_list_json(user_list_json_filename='users.json')¶

Append Twitter user list to existing user list from JSON file Use along with write_user_list_json to add new users to merge to existing JSON user file
